products.name: Clock
details: Mars-shaped clock that easily hangs on any wall from Karlsson
Features a glass construction
Battery powered

products.name: Sofa
details: Chic, exclusive sofa brings modern lines to your space with a blooming touch
Comfy sofa with a padded silhouette featuring 3 back cushions
Topped in a luxe faux leather
Assembly required

products.name: Cabinet
details: Storage cabinet made from gmelina wood in a natural woven look we love
Swinging door cabinet features 3 shelves and hanging bar inside for organizing clothes, shoes + so much more

products.name: Vinyl Record Stand Shelf
details: Keep your vinyl LPs nice + organised courtesy of this sleek storage system in a sweet vintage-inspired design
Features 2 flat shelves for display, a bottom record rack + colour pop finish

products.name: Pierce Chair
details: Artfully crafted from interwoven strands of rattan in a rounded shape, this wicker chair is the ultimate, perfect reading nook
With an hourglass silhouette and rounded seat, this chair lends a uniquely vintage look to any space

products.name: Rohini Cushion
details: Soft + cosy overstuffed cushion with tufted accents we love
Please note, this cushion does not fit a standard twin bed
Pair with any of our daybeds (sold separately), use it to top off a bench or get a few and stack them for a comfy reading nook!

products.name: Shia Bookshelf
details: Like a holiday for your treasures, this rattan bookshelf from our exclusive Shia collection is a sunny piece we love
With interwoven rattan strands along top arch + providing the base for each of the four shelves
Featuring rounded edges all over

products.name: Marble Table
details: Boho table with a marble-like top that will accentuate any space
Features a circular shape
Finished with durable hairpin-inspired support legs

products.name: Oval Shelving Unit
details: Declutter any space while adding a chic touch with this large shelving unit
Features an oval construction with a four-shelf setup
Perfect for storing books, pictures of loved ones + more!
